info.basic: What is testing, bug reports, documentation, types, methods, areas of testing, etc.) SDLC, STLC
info.HTTP: HTTP Server request methods. HTTP server response codes. Structures of HTTP requests and responses
info.API: API testing via Postman (JS, API autotests)
info.Mobile: Feature iOS, Android, guidelines. Building iOS applications on Xcode. Building Android Applications with Android Studio
info.Command: copy, create, view, move files on servers without a graphical interface
info.SQL: Create, Delete, Drop, Insert Into, Select, From, Where, Join
